MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power interruption in the WA5 postcode area of Warrington affecting properties in Newbridge Close. In order to complete repairs on the underground cable network we need to isolate the power at 10:00am and we expect the power to be restored by 3:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:00am on 9th April 2021.
